website_summaries.verdict: These sleek, stylish rose gold spoons will make a simple iced tea or classic milkshake feel much fancier.
pros: Beautiful rose gold color comes in plated metal and not from paint, so the color will never chip
Spoons are well polished with smooth, round edges, and a mirror-like shine
8-inch spoons are strong and not easily bendable
Also available in silver or black
cons: Bowl end of the spoon is wide, but quite shallow

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some longer spoons for stirring drinks etc. in larger cups. These work great for that, and are actually a lot heavier than I was expecting. I noticed some reviews complaining about how they got bent, but these would probably need to be quite a bit thicker to compensate for the extra leverage the length gives them if you plan on using them to pry frozen ice cream out of a container or something. That said, the only real 'problem' I've observed with these spoons is that the scoop is maybe 1/2 - 3/4 the size of a regular spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Batman_Bin_SuparmanTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL SHINY ROSE GOLD SPOONS
customer_reviews.text: These spoons look GREAT!!! They have a nice great shine to them. They are a true rose gold color. Their shine just makes them look so classy. The length is a good length too. But let me say it again, it's the beautiful color of rose gold and the extreme shine that makes these spoons so beautiful to look at and use = ) I know they are just spoons, but you'll see what I'm talking about when you get them. I just wish they made regular spoons, forks, and knives as well. I would literally buy the whole set.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Just like a teaspoon : (
customer_reviews.text: Thought they would be bigger since they incorporated "soup" into the description. Really wanted a long soup spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Finally got some long handles!
customer_reviews.text: these are perfect, for getting mayonnaise out of the jar, peanut butter, whatever. The handles are long enough I don't have to get my fingers in there and get them all dirty. I wish I got these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Buttman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Practical
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, pretty, pretty. And, the long handle allows me to get to the bottom of jars and things I previously used a wooden spoon for. These little rascals really are pretty and practical -- for me! Maybe for you, too!
customer_reviews.author: Bujol

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition for our coffee bar
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition for our coffee bar. The finish continues to hold up well and the length is great for taller mugs and glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Allen

customer_reviews.title: Was Hoping for Teaspoons
customer_reviews.text: These are long coffee spoons, great for stirring. I would like them better if they were matte not shiny. Otherwise they're strong.
customer_reviews.author: Objective Reader of DescriptionsTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Okay. The spoons are a bit rough in some spots.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 2001

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these spoons - my wife and I have started using them for ice cream, soup, etc. and have pretty much eliminated our regular spoons from daily use. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Plehal

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I was looking for. I use these for cocktails and adding supplements to my morning coffee. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brittaney

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, however I am short 1 spoon
customer_reviews.text: Received the spoons today. Great quality, however I am short 1 spoon. Please send me the missing spoon. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tamela Taliento

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed For Very Tall Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I have some very tall glasses and I wanted some spoons that would be taller and allow me to stir my beverages easily without them sinking into my beverage. This is great for my homemade ice cream treats or limeade, etc. I purchased the rose gold color which looks absolutely beautiful and it does the job. The spoons are smooth with no jagged or rough machining on my set. DEFINITELY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: ROD_NYC

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Great spoons. I gave them to my niece for Christmas and she was genuinely happy to get them. She knows that I never use regular, short-handled spoons in my home unless absolutely nothing else will do. I use mine for EVERYTHING. But THESE... THESE have REALLY long handles... 9 inches... and I challenge you to find any tall glass or parfait dish they won't work in. Great gift. Get them.
customer_reviews.author: LavenderMoon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Nice long handle, very sturdy, priced very well for the quality and spoon size a tad bigger than my 1950s teaspoons which is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Black Widow

customer_reviews.title: Long spoons!
customer_reviews.text: A little longer than I needed but good strong utensils! Nice cold finish. Small spoon head for anyone needing to know that. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Batcee

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for the Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set because it had the best value for money on Amazon. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beer Pong Ballerz

customer_reviews.title: Elegant gold spoons
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love quality gold flatware?! These long handled spoons are a great addition to our Oneida gold flatware set. They look great, have a nice weight and feel and seem to be a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: After my first hand wash the handles starting rusting. When I asked for a refund Amazon will only refund half of what I paid for
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lee

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: i absolutely love these spoons! they have a great weight to it
customer_reviews.author: V. pat

customer_reviews.title: 10/10! FABULOUS spoons that do not rust
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC! I use these to make coffee with my french press. Have waited several months to see how they hold up in dishwasher, and they are as good as new! Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: GlitterGirl

customer_reviews.title: jello) Will not bend easily.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty product. Use it for mainly dessert (ice cream, jello) Will not bend easily.
customer_reviews.author: RGS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ice tea spoons
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ice tea spoons, or milk shakes, or tall smoothy, etc. They survive the dishwasher just fine.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Not good for soup!
customer_reviews.text: The color was good and the length was perfect. However the bowls were smaller than they appear in the picture. Also, the handles seemed rather sharp on the edges. I returned these and bought "KOREAN RICE SPOONS" which were more to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Sanford & Son

customer_reviews.title: Overall some nice spoons
customer_reviews.text: I like their length and weight. They hold about half a teaspoon of sugar and weigh 35 grams. They are also strong and not easily bent. The only negative is that they are 304 stainless and do stain slightly with long term use.
customer_reviews.author: H. Beckerman

product_meta.title: 8x 9-Inch Long Handle Spoon 18/10 Stainless Steel Ice Cream Cocktail Teaspoons Coffee Soup Tea Spoons Color Rose Gold
product_meta.description:
Color:9-Inch 8x Spoon Rose GoldProduct Description: 
Long Handle Spoon Set of 8, used as ice cream spoons, ice teaspoons, coffee mixing spoons, cocktail stirring spoons, Suitable for bar, home, party use. 
They are Crafted from high-class (304) 18/8 stainless steel and heavily constructed. Superb durability and corrosion resistance. 
With its elongated streamlined handle, perfect for most glasses and pitchers, Also use for mixing drinks, coffee, tea. And Long enough for tall coffee mugs. Suitable for bar, home, party use.

Black, Gold, Rose Gold are the original stainless steel outer vacuum plasma coated with a layer of precious metals, because it is metal, not paint, so no paint chips. Modeling simple, looks did not show off firing skills, but still dazzling beautiful people.


Specification: 
Material: Pure high-class (304) 18/8 stainless steel
Process: Mirror Finish, Edge Smoothen
Color: Black / Gold / Rose Gold / Sliver
Size: 
Short Handle: 195mm / 7.5 inch; Handle length: 155 mm / 6 inch, Weight: 1.23 oz/pcs (9.9 oz/8 pcs).
Long Handle: 235mm / 9.25 inch; Handle length: 200 mm / 7.9 inch, Weight: 1.5 oz/pcs (12 oz/8 pcs).

Package: 8x spoon


Note:

1.The real color of the item may be slightly differently from the pictures shown on the website caused by many factors such as the brightness of the computer screen or the lighting levels;

2. A slight measurement deviation within 0.2 inch is allowed;

If we fail to satisfy you for any reason, please do contact us in time, we promise every customer with 100% fine after-sell service. We've been always trying our best to make it pleasant shopping experiences for everyone of you.

EXTRA LONG SPOONS: Perfect for most glasses and pitchers, Also used as ice cream spoons, ice teaspoons, coffee mixing spoons, cocktail stirring spoons. And Long enough for tall coffee mugs. Suitable for bar, home, party use.
LIFE STYLE: Luxurious and Stylish Design with Ergonomic Feel, Superior Quality Mirror Finished Surface, Smooth Edge definitely no rough spot. Enjoy your Leisure times in this summer!
